entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
